New Records: Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 off 34 in his second match
Rinku Singh hit his third T20I fifty
Key Match Events: India recovered from a poor start to win by 86 runs
Bangladesh struggled against India's spinners, especially Mahmudullah and others
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh opted to chase, while India chose to bat first to test their bowlers in dew conditions
Post-Match Reflections: India sealed the series with a strong win
Bangladesh's batting failed to handle pressure against India's spinners
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's highest T20I total was 135/9 but wasn't enough
India's spinners conceded only 49 runs in nine overs
